job.title: Senior Software Engineer - Android
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Internet,Marketing and Advertising
job.description: At realtorcom we believe that everyone deserves a home of their own Were a community of nearly 2000 employees who work hard to ensure that from the moment someone starts dreaming about a new home to the moment they walk in the door and beyond were there to lend a helping hand Every month over 85 million people trust us with their journey home by visiting our site and mobile apps and wed love to have you join our team to helpbrbrYou will join a diverse team of talented engineers building out our Android apps  the apps that guide millions of home buyers through their most important purchasebrbrWe have highly collaborative crossfunctional teams that consistently deliver an outstanding user experiencebrbrstronguChallenges You Will Be Pursuing In 2020brustrongulliDesign build and maintain our Android Mobile App liliParticipate in research and development of highly scalable consumer facing applicationsliliIdentify new technologies trends opportunities and how they might enhance our products and businessliliChampion innovations that yield high product reliability quality and reusabilityliliBring some technical leadership to a team of Mobile developersliliLead some complex initiatives and architecturally significant new featuresliliWork across the organization to get things done brliulstronguThe Following Is Relevant To UsbrustrongulliHandson development experience in Kotlin andor FlutterliliPassion for mobile development with handson experience developing mobile appsliliGood understanding of Mobile Design patternsliliStrong interest and focus on the user experienceliliExcellent software engineering and architecture skills coding standards code reviews source control management continuous integration etcliliGood unit testing and debugging skillslili5 or more years experience developing mobile apps in one or more modern programming languages eg Kotlin JavabrliulIf you like the sound of us then please throw your hat in the ring While we take a look at your application we encourage you to get to know us a bit more through our site and social channels  such as our tech blog our many awards amp recognition the ways we give back to the community and more on the realtorcom blogbrbrWeve got great offices in the US and Canada with lots of sweet jobs to choose from so were hoping youll join us on our journey to make buying selling renting and living in homes easier and more rewarding for everyonebrbrLets make a difference together For Realbrbr
